document_data.name: Rothé
document_data.mainbody: '''Rothé''' ({{Pronounce|ro|THAY|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) were herd animals and one of the primary livestock of [[human]]s in [[Faerûn]]'s northern areas and of the [[drow]] of the [[Underdark]] below.

Species.[[Surface rothé]]: Herd species living in northern Faerûn.
Species.[[Deep rothé]]: This sub-species communicated with magical flashing lights in the Underdark.
Species.[[Ghost rothé]]: These rothé were larger than average, and were white with magical abilities that grant them transportation and silence.
